org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

Class ReportHeadingCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.ReportHeadingCell
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeaderCell

    public class ReportHeadingCell
extends java.lang.Object
    IMMUTABLE class holding information regarding a single cell of a rasterized Column, please keep it as such! This is the NiReports API equivalent of the ReportsAPI ReportCell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int colSpan
      the colspan in the heading
      protected java.lang.String name
      the string to be displayed in the heading cell
      protected int rowSpan
      the rowspan in the heading
      protected int startColumn
      the column relative to the heading start where this is in the heading (0-based)
      protected int startRow
      the starting row in the heading
      protected int totalRowSpan
      the total rowspan (including all the subcolumns) in the heading

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportHeadingCell

        public ReportHeadingCell(int startRow,
                         int totalRowSpan,
                         int rowSpan,
                         int startColumn,
                         int colSpan,
                         java.lang.String name)
        constructs an instance with the given parameters. In case the input data is inconsistent or incorrect, will throw a RuntimeException
        Parameters:
        startRow - zero-based non-negative number of the toplevel row of the header cell
        totalRowSpan - positive rowspan (depth) of the header tree
        rowSpan - positive rowspan of the header cell. Should be less than or equal to totalRowSpan
        startColumn - zero-based nonnegative x-coo of the beginning of the cell
        colSpan - positive x-span of the cell
        name -
